fields.name: Agency Responsible
fields.description: The department in charge of the service request.

fields.name: Expected Date Time
fields.description: The date and time when the service request can be expected to be fulfilled. This may be based on a service-specific service level agreement.

fields.name: Latitude
fields.description: The latitude for the location of the service request.

fields.name: Longitude
fields.description: The longitude for the location of the service request.

fields.name: Media Url
fields.description: A URL to media associated with the request, eg an image.

fields.name: Requested Date Time
fields.description: The date and time when the service request was made.

fields.name: Service Code
fields.description: The unique identifier for the service or information request type.

fields.name: Service Name
fields.description: The human readable name of the service request type.

fields.name: Service Notice
fields.description: Information about the action expected to fulfill the request or otherwise address the information reported.

fields.name: Service Request ID
fields.description: The unique ID of the service request created.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The current status of the service request.

fields.name: Status Notes
fields.description: Explanation of why the status was changed to current state or more details on current status than conveyed with status alone.

fields.name: Updated Date Time
fields.description: The date and time when the service request was last modified.

fields.name: Zipcode
fields.description: zipcode The zipcode of where the service occurred.
